item.masi.mage_certificate.tooltip: Recorded the magical journey of a mage,Right click to use
item.masi.trial_card.tooltip: Legendary Mage Peak Experience Card, instantly unleashes magic within one minute of use, unlimited magic power
item.masi.magic_sword.tooltip: Each attack triggers a sweep, long press the right button for 0.5 seconds
item.masi.magic_sword2.tooltip: to release sword energy, and can accumulate up to 5 seconds
item.masi.arcane_bow.tooltip: After pulling the bow for 0.1 seconds, the arrow can be released, accumulating up to 5 seconds. After the arrow collides,
item.masi.arcane_bow2.tooltip: it can split and shoot towards nearby targets. The longer the accumulation time, the more splits there will be
item.masi.fire_ball_magic.tooltip: Sing for 1 second and release fireball
item.masi.creating_water_magic.tooltip: Sing for 0.5 second and put water,set target air -20 if use on LivingEntity
item.masi.heal_magic.tooltip: Sing for 1 second and treat the goal in front of you, otherwise treat yourself
item.masi.flicker_magic.tooltip: Sing for 1 second and tp to the position where you are looking
item.masi.random_magic.tooltip: After release, it randomly changes to other magics, whether you have learned them
item.masi.arcane_shield_magic.tooltip: Obtain a magic shield to counteract damage
item.masi.lightning_magic.tooltip: Launch an electric ball, collide and drop lightning
item.masi.arcane_missile_magic.tooltip: Release missiles to attack targets within a range of 20 * 20 * 20. The higher the total magic, the greater the damage
item.masi.gain_circle_magic.tooltip: Set up a 10 second magic formation under your feet and give beneficial StatusEffects to the players inside
item.masi.fly_magic.tooltip: Continuously consuming magic, providing lift to lift oneself
item.masi.dimension_exile_magic.tooltip: Exile the creatures in front of you to an unknown dimension, which can only be used in the main world
item.masi.imprison_magic.tooltip: Imprisoned the creatures in front of them, but unable to move themselves
item.masi.ingestion_magic.tooltip: Suck the entities within the range to the end of the magic
item.masi.taunt_magic.tooltip: Mock surrounding targets and attract them to attack oneself
item.masi.lose_circle_magic.tooltip: Set up a magic array that lasts for 10 seconds, and creatures touched will experience five negative effects
item.masi.shadow_mane_magic.tooltip: Lock in surrounding creatures, then teleport to each target and inflict damage
item.masi.steal_magic.tooltip: Steal an item from the target's body
item.masi.stealth_magic.tooltip: After release, it can remain invisible for 20 seconds, allowing nearby creatures to become invisible together
item.masi.arcane_torrent_magic.tooltip: Lasts for 10 seconds, dealing damage to the straight target in front of you
item.masi.cold_disaster_magic.tooltip: Freeze surrounding targets to subject them to freezing effects, but also freeze oneself
item.masi.purification_magic.tooltip: Purifying the target around the body, clearing negative potion effects, and removing magic effects not only applied by the user and target, but also causing damage to undead creatures
item.masi.death_declaration_magic.toolti: Release the curse, the hit creature will die in one minute, and the undead will be full of blood. Can be purified by magic purification
item.masi.arcane_minion_magic.tooltip: Summon an arcane servant with 50 points of magic, which will release all arcane magic, but each release will consume its magic. If the magic is exhausted, it will die
item.masi.element_aggregation_magic.tool: Continuously chant to lock in surrounding targets and lower elemental impact
item.masi.elemental_blessing_magic.toolt: Receiving blessings from the four elements, the body becomes incredibly strong, but it will continue to lose its magic power. When the magic power is exhausted, it will die
item.masi.arcane_tentacles_magic.tooltip: If the target has magic, continue to absorb the opponent's magic. If not, absorb a drop of their blood to replenish oneself
item.masi.arcane_tentacles_magic2.toolti: Using it while squatting can deliver magic to the target
item.masi.revenge_magic.tooltip: Passive, deals 10 points of damage to surrounding creatures when dying, and transmits its negative potion effect. The more remaining magic, the larger the range
item.masi.arcane_sword_magic.tooltip: Consume magic, condense a sword, long press to store sword energy, the longer the sword energy, the stronger the sword energy
item.masi.arcane_bow_magic.tooltip: Concentrate a bow that can launch magical arrows
item.masi.block_hidden_magic.tooltip: Replace the blocks within the 5*5*5 area with air.If any creatures
item.masi.block_hidden_magic.tooltip2: other than the caster enter the area or after 1 minute,the replaced blocks will recover
item.masi.space_pack_magic.tooltip: This magic allow you pack blocks in 10*10*10,you can put them with original sample, when you release it again
item.masi.space_pack_magic.tooltip2: Mainly BlockStates and items in blocks will be saved true,the data are saved at level dir named masi_packs.dat
masi.panel.exp.message: Lack of experience, unable to learn
